snippet: Mr. Davie appropriated mythical and mystical imagery from various cultures, including Navajo, Celtic, Caribbean, aboriginal Australian and ancient Egyptian.
abstract: Alan Davie, Scottish-born painter whose colorful abstractions put personal stamp on Pollock-like expressionism and seized on mythical and mystical imagery from cultures worldwide, dies at age 93.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Davie appropriated mythical and mystical imagery from various cultures, including Navajo, Celtic, Caribbean, aboriginal Australian and ancient Egyptian.

headline.main: Alan Davie, Painter With a Global Bent, Dies at 93
headline.print_headline: Alan Davie, Painter With a Global Bent, Dies at 93
